languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, помилуйте... мало того что вы завели себе ручного ксеноса, так сейчас еще выяснится, что с ним в комплекте идет отдельная свита из его родственников!"
"Throne's mercy... Lord Captain, it was extravagant enough of you to get yourself a pet xenos and now we discover that he comes with a whole gaggle of his kinfolk!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, помилуйте... мало того что вы завели себе ручного ксеноса, так сейчас еще выяснится, что с ним в комплекте идет отдельная свита из его родственников!"

traits.locale_text: "Throne's mercy... Lord Captain, it was extravagant enough of you to get yourself a pet xenos, and now we discover that he comes with a whole gaggle of his kinsfolk!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Throne's mercy... Lord Captain, it was extravagant enough of you to get yourself a pet xenos and now we discover that he comes with a whole gaggle of his kinfolk!"

languages.text: « Par le Trône... {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vos accointances avec un xénos étaient déjà suffisamment extravagantes en elles-mêmes, et nous découvrons maintenant qu'il est accompagné d'un troupeau de ses semblables ! »
languages.original_text: "Throne's mercy... Lord Captain, it was extravagant enough of you to get yourself a pet xenos and now we discover that he comes with a whole gaggle of his kinfolk!"

traits.locale_text: « Par le Trône... {Mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vos accointances avec un xénos étaient déjà suffisamment extravagantes en elles-mêmes, et nous découvrons maintenant qu'il est accompagné d'un troupeau de ses semblables ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “黄金王座在上……舰长大人，你把那只异形宠物弄到了船上。这件事情已经够奢侈了，现在它还把它的亲戚全都带过来了！”
languages.original_text: "Throne's mercy... Lord Captain, it was extravagant enough of you to get yourself a pet xenos and now we discover that he comes with a whole gaggle of his kinfolk!"

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上……舰长大人，你把那只异形宠物弄到了船上。这件事情已经够奢侈了，现在它还把它的亲戚全都带过来了！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「王座のご慈悲か…ロード・キャプテン、手駒になる異種族を味方に引き入れるとは贅沢なことをしたものですね。しかも、その異種族の一族を引き連れているとは！」
languages.original_text: "Throne's mercy... Lord Captain, it was extravagant enough of you to get yourself a pet xenos and now we discover that he comes with a whole gaggle of his kinfolk!"

traits.locale_text: 「王座のご慈悲か…ロード・キャプテン、手駒になる異種族を味方に引き入れるとは贅沢なことをしたものですね。しかも、その異種族の一族を引き連れているとは！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bei der Gnade des Throns ... Lord Captain, es war schon sehr ausgefallen, dass Ihr Euch ein Xenos-Haustier zugelegt habt, aber jetzt wird klar, dass wir es mit einer ganzen Schar seiner Verwandten zu tun bekommen!"
languages.original_text: "Throne's mercy... Lord Captain, it was extravagant enough of you to get yourself a pet xenos and now we discover that he comes with a whole gaggle of his kinfolk!"

traits.locale_text: "Bei der Gnade des Throns ... Lord Captain, es war schon sehr ausgefallen, dass Ihr Euch ein Xenos-Haustier zugelegt habt, aber jetzt wird klar, dass wir es mit einer ganzen Schar seiner Verwandten zu tun bekommen!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Que el Trono nos guarde... Lord Capitán, ya nos pareció extravagante que se buscase una mascota xenos, ¡y ahora resulta que viene con una camada entera!».
languages.original_text: "Throne's mercy... Lord Captain, it was extravagant enough of you to get yourself a pet xenos and now we discover that he comes with a whole gaggle of his kinfolk!"

traits.locale_text: «Que el Trono nos guarde... Lord Capitán, ya nos pareció extravagante que se buscase una mascota xenos, ¡y ahora resulta que viene con una camada entera!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Taht bize merhamet etsin. Lord Kaptan, kendinize evcil bir zeno edinmeniz zaten yeterince abartılı bir hareketti. Şimdi de bir sürü akrabasını başımıza musallat ediyoruz!"
languages.original_text: "Throne's mercy... Lord Captain, it was extravagant enough of you to get yourself a pet xenos and now we discover that he comes with a whole gaggle of his kinfolk!"

traits.locale_text: "Taht bize merhamet etsin. Lord Kaptan, kendinize evcil bir zeno edinmeniz zaten yeterince abartılı bir hareketti, şimdi de arkasında kendi türünden bir sürü olduğunu keşfediyoruz!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
